```{r data import, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())

df = read.csv("../data/example-trials.csv", header = TRUE)
demo = read.csv("../data/example-subject_information.csv", header = TRUE)

df$cresponse = str_to_lower(gsub(" ", "", df$response))

```

```{r responses, include=FALSE}
responses = df %>%
  filter(str_detect(utterance,"bot_check", negate = TRUE)) %>%
  group_by(object,cresponse) %>%
  mutate(count = n())

ggplot(responses,aes(x=response, y=n))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~object)
```
